Text:
Top quality upload. 

There is nothing better than listening to rain when drifting off to sleep. One tip though, don't have it too load if wearing earphones because the first thunder might scare the crap out of you :-)

Cheers M8
Yea I agree, the first thunder can scare the crap out of you. It's all quiet for the first few minutes and then BOOM thunder. So maybe skip the first 5 minutes or so.
